data.title: Can I get Disney Plus on my Virgin Media box?
data.meta_description: Virgin customers, here's all you need to know about getting Disney Plus on your box.
data.text:
Among the eclectic collection of content are favourites like Peter Pan, Aladdin, The Jungle Book and Lady and the Tramp. There are also new children's classics like Frozen, Encanto, and Inside Out.

Disney Plus also has loads of more adult shows and films like the new Japanese series, Shōgun, the Star Wars and Marvel universes, and plenty more.

If you're interested in a Disney Plus subscription and are a Virgin Media customer, then we're here to tell you how you can get all that Disney Plus has to offer through your box.

More like this

Sign-up to Disney Plus from £4.99 a month

For more pricing information, check out our guide to how much is Disney Plus.

Also, see our guide to the best Disney Plus shows and best Disney Plus movies to watch right now.

Can I get Disney Plus on my Virgin Media box?

Yes, if you're a Virgin Media customer with a Stream Box or Virgin TV 360 you can get Disney Plus direct to your TV through the box.

You first have to have a Disney Plus account, and subscriptions are set at a range of prices.

The Standard with Ads plan will cost £4.99 a month, and gives you access to 1080p Disney content to stream across two devices simultaneously.

However, you can't stream the ads tier on your Virgin Media box. Instead, you'll have to sign up for the Standard plan, which costs £7.99 a month. The Standard plan has no adverts, and you can download content to watch offline on two devices.

If you want to go all out, then the Premium plan could be the one for you. For £10.99 a month, you can enjoy ultra-high definition (4K HDR) ad-free content streamed and downloaded across four devices.

Sign-up to Disney Plus from £4.99 a month

How to watch Disney Plus On Virgin TV

Once you've signed up via the Disney Plus website, just log in through your box and watch away. As well as Virgin Media, you'll be able to watch Disney Plus on your Smart TV and plenty of other devices.

Shows are downloadable on all subscription levels (apart from the ads tier), so you can watch them later on Android phones and tablets, iPhones, iPads and Amazon Fire Tablets. It's worth noting that downloads last for 30 days.

If you're all set and ready to go then why not check out our Disney Plus guides? There's a full list of everything on Disney Plus, the best TV shows on Disney Plus and best films on Disney Plus.

Sign-up to Disney Plus from £4.99 a month
